page.title: 13entertainment
page.content: Entertainment in this area of E.Cornwall is mostly amateur, but there is an abundance os talent,and events are lively and well attended.Organ music is popular,and recitals are given in SOUTH HILL CHURCH.Choirs visit the didtrict regularly.STOKE CLIMSLAND W.I. sponsors many events. Members run monthly musical appreciation evenings, an outdoor summer cocert of classical music given by proffesional musicians, and a busy Drama Club.A disco is held occasionally in the Duchy Hall, and barn dances are popular.Recreation is centered at the Sports Club at Venterdon. There is a football pitch,a cricket field,and a tennis court.Flood lighting is installed,and there is a pavilion with a kitchen.Teams compete locally and pitches are fully used. There are visirs to places of interest
